currency.description: Currency of the items associated with the event, in 3-letter ISO 4217 format. Is required, if value is set.

affiliation.description: A product affiliation to designate a supplying company or brick and mortar store location

coupon.description: The coupon name or code associated with the item.

discount.description: The monetary discount value associated with the item.

index.description: The index of the item in a list.

item_category2.description: The second category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item.

item_category3.description: The third category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item.

item_category4.description: The fourth category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item.

item_category5.description: The fifth category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item.

item_list_id.description: The ID of the list in which the item was presented to the user.

item_list_name.description: The name of the list in which the item was presented to the user.

item_variant.description: The item variant or unique code or description for additional item details or options.

location_id.description: The location associated with the item.

price.description: The monetary price of the item, in units of the specified currency parameter.

value.description: The monetary value of the event.
